pages.text: Mobs spawned will be assigned a level based on dimension, biome, location, entity type, and nearest player. Mobs will gain health, damage, and traits based on its level.$(br2)Player will gain difficulty when killing mobs. Killing mobs with higher level will increase difficulty faster. Dying will reduce player difficulty.

There are also other factors that may determine mob level: By default, mobs further from the origin will have higher levels, and the more dimensions you have visited, the stronger the mobs you meet will be.$(br2)You can view all related information in your inventory tab.
